meanings.def: to tell somebody that you are grateful for something
examples: thank somebody for something I must write and thank Mary for the present.
In his speech, he thanked everyone for all their hard work.
thank somebody for doing something She said goodbye and thanked us for coming.
thank somebody There's no need to thank me—I enjoyed doing it.
I'd like to take this opportunity to thank everyone I've worked with over the years.
The organizing committee wish to thank their sponsors and all who helped.
I would like to thank you all most sincerely.
Thank you very much. It's very kind of you./You really shouldn't have.
Thank you so much for coming. It was really nice to see you.
I'm very grateful.
I do appreciate your help.
That's all right.
Don't mention it.
No problem.
My pleasure.
I'm glad I could help.
I wanted to thank him personally.
I have to thank you all so much.

meanings.def: used when you are saying who or what is responsible for something
examples: I have my parents to thank for my success.
Largely we have science to thank for our longer, healthier lives.

meanings.def: used to tell somebody that you are annoyed and do not want them to do something
examples: I'll thank you to mind your own business.

meanings.def: used to say that you are pleased about something
examples: Thank God you're safe!
‘Thank goodness for that!’ she said with a sigh of relief.
Thank heavens I've found my keys.

meanings.def: to feel very grateful and lucky about something
examples: Just thank your lucky stars you weren’t in the house at the time.

meanings.def: used to say that somebody will not be pleased or will be annoyed about something
examples: John won't thank you for interfering.

idioms.def: used when you are saying who or what is responsible for something
examples: I have my parents to thank for my success.
Largely we have science to thank for our longer, healthier lives.

examples: I'll thank you to mind your own business.

examples: Just thank your lucky stars you weren’t in the house at the time.

idioms.idiom: somebody won’t thank you for something
